
``select_expression_values``
================================

select_expression_values

Description
-----------

helper function to select expression values

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   select_expression_values(gobject, values)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``gobject``
     - giotto object
   * - ``values``
     - expression values to extract


Value
-----

expression matrix
